name: Hovering Cannon
description: While attacking, the Hovering Cannon generates additional attacks that deal damage to the same enemies. Your damage will never be too low again.
source: Summon a Hovering Cannon for 20 seconds with the skill: Laser Beam, which deals **5.6%** ATK damage to the target each time. Cooldown: **240** seconds.

advancement.description: Gain the <yellow_lbl_**14_1**>Laser Matrix skill: Freeze targets after dealing damage to them 4 times in a row and deal damage equal to a maximum of **93.2%** of ATK.
Increase frost damage by **1.5%**, even if not deployed. Unavailable in Apex League.
Gain the <yellow_lbl_**14_1**>Crash skill: Deal damage to the target equal to **55.9%** of ATK and stun them for **0.5** seconds.
